evidence_in_dialogue: [[Sara]] i pulled the x rays of our most likely candidates
[[Mr._Mendez]] my kid took a wrong turn somewhere -- maybe it 's my fault , i do n't know -- but somebody 's boy is in that bed and he 's not mine
[[Sofia_Curtis]] your print belongs to an enlisted man
[[Warrick]] ... and one suspect -- vincent mendoza ... booked for meth manufacture
[[Warrick]] your client killed a man in a holding cell and tried to frame the cops for it
